title: automatic getResponse behaviour
body:
2025-11-06 14:26:30,538 - DEBUG - sam-server   - org.eclipse.keyple.core.service.LocalReaderAdapter - Reader [HID Global OMNIKEY 3x21 Smart Card Reader [OMNIKEY 3x21 Smart Card Reader] 04 00] --> apduRequest: APDU_REQUEST = {"apdu":"902AEEACF6DF24820121..C7830830F5","successfulStatusWords":["9000"]}, elapsed 72.9 ms
2025-11-06 14:26:30,556 - DEBUG - sam-server   - org.eclipse.keyple.core.service.LocalReaderAdapter - Reader [HID Global OMNIKEY 3x21 Smart Card Reader [OMNIKEY 3x21 Smart Card Reader] 04 00] <-- apduResponse: APDU_RESPONSE = {"apdu":"6200","statusWord":"6200"}, elapsed 17.8 ms
2025-11-06 14:26:30,556 - DEBUG - sam-server   - org.eclipse.keyple.core.service.LocalReaderAdapter - Reader [HID Global OMNIKEY 3x21 Smart Card Reader [OMNIKEY 3x21 Smart Card Reader] 04 00] --> apduRequest: APDU_REQUEST = {"apdu":"802AEEAC30D67BED4FE1D64396D4C466B5A85F42642FC6C08F4BDA03CEFE62C6ADD43E252EC7EF47C0AF7B23A7CB965C4320251101F6","successfulStatusWords":["9000"]}, elapsed 0.6 ms
2025-11-06 14:26:30,731 - DEBUG - sam-server   - org.eclipse.keyple.core.service.LocalReaderAdapter - Reader [HID Global OMNIKEY 3x21 Smart Card Reader [OMNIKEY 3x21 Smart Card Reader] 04 00] <-- apduResponse: APDU_RESPONSE = {"apdu":"6100","statusWord":"6100"}, elapsed 174.8 ms
2025-11-06 14:26:30,732 - DEBUG - sam-server   - org.eclipse.keyple.core.service.LocalReaderAdapter - Reader [HID Global OMNIKEY 3x21 Smart Card Reader [OMNIKEY 3x21 Smart Card Reader] 04 00] --> apduRequest: APDU_REQUEST = {"apdu":"00C0000000","successfulStatusWords":["9000"],"info":"Internal Get Response"}, elapsed 0.7 ms
2025-11-06 14:26:30,746 - DEBUG - sam-server   - org.eclipse.keyple.core.service.LocalReaderAdapter - Reader [HID Global OMNIKEY 3x21 Smart Card Reader [OMNIKEY 3x21 Smart Card Reader] 04 00] <-- apduResponse: APDU_RESPONSE = {"apdu":"DF4482018011010BA0000002....5C37657B3132914**6185","statusWord":"6185"}**, elapsed 13.5 ms

here it should have been relaunched to get the remaining data.
2025-11-06 14:26:30,768 - DEBUG - sam-server   - o.e.k.core.service.DistributedLocalServiceAdapter  - Service [samPlugin] processes data on reader [HID Global OMNIKEY 3x21 Smart Card Reader [OMNIKEY 3x21 Smart Card Reader] 04 00]: {"coreApiLevel":2,"service":"TRANSMIT_CARD_REQUEST","parameters":{"cardRequest":{"apduRequests":[{"apdu":"80C00000F6","successfulStatusWords":["9000"]},{"apdu":"80C000008F","successfulStatusWords":["9000"]}],"stopOnUnsuccessfulStatusWord":false},"channelControl":"KEEP_OPEN"}}

title: Add support for case 1 APDU commands
body:
The creation of a Case 1 command (4 bytes) is currently impossible for the following reasons:
https://github.com/eclipse-keyple/keyple-card-generic-java-lib/blob/e79e1028041422e9a557ed7128b4d9543bf23f44/src/main/java/org/eclipse/keyple/card/generic/CardTransactionManagerAdapter.java#L75
